accessibilityRoutes.name: Main Wheelchair Accessible Route
accessibilityRoutes.description: A paved pathway suitable for wheelchairs and mobility devices, providing access to the most significant temple groups including Group A and Group B. Features gentle slopes and rest areas.

accessibilityRoutes.name: Assisted Walking Route
accessibilityRoutes.description: A shorter route designed for visitors with limited mobility who can walk short distances with assistance. Includes frequent seating areas and shorter walking segments.

accessibilityRoutes.name: Audio-Guided Route for Visually Impaired
accessibilityRoutes.description: A tactile-friendly route with audio descriptions and textured pathways. Includes tactile models of temple structures and detailed audio guides describing the architectural features.

emergencyContact.name: My Son Sanctuary Administration
emergencyContact.role: Site Administrator and Emergency Response Coordinator
